title: Favorite social networks of U.S. teens 2012 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 13 different Responses on X-axis for 8 groups Snapchat, Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr, Pinterest, Google+, and Other. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents who use network most often.

In Response Fall 2017, Snapchat had the highest Share of respondents who use network most often 47.0 among the 8 groups and in Fall 2012, Snapchat had the lowest Share of respondents who use network most often 0.0.
In Response Fall 2017, Snapchat had the maximum Share of respondents who use network most often and it saw the lowest in Response Fall 2012 out of all 13 Responses.
There is a gap of 46.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents who use network most often found for Snapchat in Response Fall 2017 and Fall 2012.
yAxis: Share of respondents who use network most often
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 13 different Responses on X-axis for 8 groups Snapchat, Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr, Pinterest, Google+, and Other. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents who use network most often.

Response Fall 2017 had the maximum Share of respondents who use network most often among all 8 groups, and it was for Snapchat. The minimum Share of respondents who use network most often was observed in Response Fall 2012 for Snapchat.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 13 different Responses on X-axis for 8 groups Snapchat, Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr, Pinterest, Google+, and Other. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents who use network most often.

In Response Fall 2017, Snapchat had the highest Share of respondents who use network most often 47.0 among the 8 groups and in Fall 2012, Snapchat had the lowest Share of respondents who use network most often 0.0.
In Response Fall 2017, Snapchat had the maximum Share of respondents who use network most often and it saw the lowest in Response Fall 2012 out of all 13 Responses.
There is a gap of 46.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents who use network most often found for Snapchat in Response Fall 2017 and Fall 2012.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents who use network most often on the Y-axis for 13 different Responses for 8 groups Snapchat, Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr, Pinterest, Google+, and Other that are presented on the X-axis.

Out of all 8 groups, Snapchat had the highest Share of respondents who use network most often in Response Fall 2017 and Snapchat had the lowest Share of respondents who use network most often in Response Fall 2012.

Among all the Responses, Snapchat had the highest Share of respondents who use network most often in Response Fall 2017 and lowest Share of respondents who use network most often in Response Fall 2012.
There is a gap of 46.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents who use network most often found for Snapchat in Response Fall 2017 and Fall 2012.

Among the groups, Snapchat had the biggest difference in Share of respondents who use network most often. Where the maximum Share of respondents who use network most often was 47.0 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents who use network most often.

In Response Fall 2017, Snapchat had the highest Share of respondents who use network most often 47.0 among the 8 groups and in Fall 2012, Snapchat had the lowest Share of respondents who use network most often 0.0. The second highest Share of respondents who use network most often 5.0 was observed for Snapchat in Response Fall 2017.

On average, the Response Fall 2013 had the highest Share of respondents who use network most often for all 8 groups Snapchat, Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr, Pinterest, Google+, and Other. Whereas Spring 2017 had the lowest average Share of respondents who use network most often.
